404.description: You hear music in the distance, but nothing can be seen here.

description: Listen Together with Friends around the Globe. All you need are your favorite songs and a YouTube, Spotify, or Apple Music account.

listen.title: Listen Anywhere
listen.description: Stereo integrates with the music applications you know and love. All you need is a YouTube, Spotify, or Apple Music account.
listen.p: Your friend listens to a different music application? No worry, Stereo will find and play that same song on your application instead.

playlist.title: Quick Start
playlist.p1: It takes less than 30 seconds to start listening together. Listen to songs from your library.
playlist.p2: Have a good playlist to share with friends, or did your favorite artists just release their new album? All you need is a link!

rules.title: Your Story. Your Rule.
rules.p1: Listen either in public or private stories. Set a password to avoid unwelcome guests. Everyone can chat and react, but only collaborators can add songs.
rules.p2: Invite your close friends to be moderators. Ban uncivil listeneres. Customize story rules so everyone know what songs will fit.

support.title: Support
support.p: Be sure to reach out at any time should you have any ideas, questions, or encounter any bugs.

delete.label: Deactivate account
delete.description: You can delete your account at any time.

modal.title: Sad to See You Go...
modal.description: Deactivating your account will remove all of your information, stories.

delete.deleted: Your account and data has been removed. Feel free to come back at any time!
